Well I don't know much about anything, but I sure liked this film. In short, it was creative, humorous, simple, and heartwarming.
I could tell that the people working behind-the-scenes really cared about their film. Terrence does a humorous performance as Dudley. Unfortunately he doesn't get to say much of anything major... This is a very straight-forward story with no hard-to-comprehend plot twists or immensely emotional scenes.
